BUSTATION Email Email BUSTATION
Login Sign up Plan exactly the time of your next trip! Save time knowing the route of the public buses in Costa Rica. This app will allow you to know in real time the location of the bus that you need to know. Join us!
Login Sign up Dont have an account? LOGÍN Email Password

Home Gallery Slideshow Contac History Terms of use Team About us Sign off Admin
The BU-STATION App was born thanks to the idea of 3 students from the Fidélitas University in Costa Rica, where in a project to be carried out in one of their courses, they propose to design the idea of showing the bus route in real time, with in order to help users save waiting times and thus help them make better use of their time.\n\nAs a result of this idea, this group of people worked on the design of the application for more than three months , where sharing their ideas and advised by a teacher, they manage to complete this objective that brought a sigh to all those people. Historia
